people_also_ask.question: What is a flashback?
people_also_ask.heading: What are flashbacks? A flashback is a vivid experience in which you relive some aspects of a traumatic event or feel as if it is happening right now. This can sometimes be like watching a video of what happened, but flashbacks do not necessarily involve seeing images, or reliving events from start to finish.

knowledge_panel.description: fredrick fitzell starts having horrific visions of a girl who vanished in high school. he reaches out to old friends with whom he used to take a mysterious drug but soon realizes the only solution lies deep within his own memories.
